name: Kouzuki Oden
text: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effects, you may instead trash 2 cards from your hand. Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards and return 1 of your other Characters to your hand: Set this Character as active.

effect.text: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effects, you may instead trash 2 cards from your hand.
Return 1 of your other Characters to your hand: Set this Character as active.
